placeholderStyle.description: 原生属性，指定 placeholder 的样式
placeholderStyle.description_zh: 原生属性，指定 placeholder 的样式

placeholderClass.description: 原生属性，指定 placeholder 的样式类
placeholderClass.description_zh: 原生属性，指定 placeholder 的样式类

maxlength.description: The native property, the maximum input length, is set to -1 without limiting the maximum length
maxlength.description_zh: 原生属性，最大输入长度，设置为 -1 的时候不限制最大长度

auto-focus.description: Native attributes, autofocus, pull up the keyboard.
auto-focus.description_zh: 原生属性，自动聚焦，拉起键盘。

auto-height.description: When auto-height is set, style.height does not take effect
auto-height.description_zh: 原生属性，是否自动增高，设置 auto-height 时，style.height 不生效

fixed.description: If the textarea is in a position:fixed area, you need to display the specified property fixed as true
fixed.description_zh: 如果 textarea 是在一个 position:fixed 的区域，需要显示指定属性 fixed 为 true

cursorSpacing.description: Native property, which specifies the distance between the cursor and the keyboard. Take the minimum of the distance from the bottom of the textarea and the distance specified by cursor-spacing as the distance between the cursor and the keyboard
cursorSpacing.description_zh: 原生属性，指定光标与键盘的距离。取 textarea 距离底部的距离和 cursor-spacing 指定的距离的最小值作为光标与键盘的距离

cursor.description: Native property, specifying the cursor position when focus
cursor.description_zh: 原生属性，指定 focus 时的光标位置

confirm-type.description: Set the text for the button in the lower-right corner of the keyboard
confirm-type.description_zh: 设置键盘右下角按钮的文字

confirm-hold.description: Whether to keep the keyboard unfolded when you click the button in the lower right corner of the keyboard
confirm-hold.description_zh: 点击键盘右下角按钮时是否保持键盘不收起

show-confirm-bar.description: Whether to display the bar with the Done button at the top of the keyboard
show-confirm-bar.description_zh: 是否显示键盘上方带有”完成“按钮那一栏

selection-start.description: Native properties, cursor start position, valid when auto-clustering, need to be used with selection-end
selection-start.description_zh: 原生属性，光标起始位置，自动聚集时有效，需与 selection-end 搭配使用

selection-end.description: Native property, cursor end position, valid when auto-gathering, needs to be used with selection-start
selection-end.description_zh: 原生属性，光标结束位置，自动聚集时有效，需与 selection-start 搭配使用

adjust-position.description: Native attributes, whether the page is automatically pushed up when the keyboard pops up
adjust-position.description_zh: 原生属性，键盘弹起时，是否自动上推页面

disable-default-padding.description: Native attributes, whether to remove the default padding under iOS
disable-default-padding.description_zh: 原生属性，是否去掉 iOS 下的默认内边距

hold-keyboard.description: Native attributes, focus, do not collapse the keyboard when clicking on the page
hold-keyboard.description_zh: 原生属性，focus 时，点击页面的时候不收起键盘

prefix-icon.description: Prep-icon is the name of the icon class in the icon component
prefix-icon.description_zh: 前置图标，icon 组件中的图标类名

use-prefix-slot.description_zh: 使用 前置图标 插槽

show-word-limit.description: To display the word limit, maxlength needs to be set at the same time
show-word-limit.description_zh: 显示字数限制，需要同时设置 maxlength

label.description: Set the title on the left

label-width.description: Set the width of the header on the left

size.description: Set the size of the input box

error.description: Set the error status of the input box, which is red when the error status is in
error.description_zh: 设置输入框错误状态，错误状态时为红色

center.description: When there is a label attribute, set the title and input box to be vertically centered, with the top centered by default
center.description_zh: 当有 label 属性时，设置标题和输入框垂直居中，默认为顶部居中

no-border.description: 非 cell 类型下是否隐藏下划线
no-border.description_zh: 非 cell 类型下是否隐藏下划线

prop.description: The form field model field name, which is required if the form validation function is used
prop.description_zh: 表单域 model 字段名，在使用表单校验功能的情况下，该属性是必填的

clearTrigger.description: When the clear icon is displayed, always indicates that the input box is not displayed when it is empty, and focus indicates that the input box is focused and not displayed when it is empty
clearTrigger.description_zh: 显示清除图标的时机，always 表示输入框不为空时展示，focus 表示输入框聚焦且不为空时展示

focusWhenClear.description: Whether or not to focus the input box when the Clear button is clicked
focusWhenClear.description_zh: 是否在点击清除按钮时聚焦输入框

ignoreCompositionEvent.description: 是否忽略组件内对文本合成系统事件的处理。 为 false 时将触发 compositionstart、compositionend、compositionupdate 事件,且在文本合成期间会触发 input 事件。
ignoreCompositionEvent.description_zh: 是否忽略组件内对文本合成系统事件的处理。为 false 时将触发 compositionstart、compositionend、compositionupdate 事件，且在文本合成期间会触发 input 事件。

events.name: input
events.description_zh: 监听输入框 input 事件

events.name: focus
events.description: Listen for the input box focus event
events.params: { value, height }, height 为键盘高度
events.description_zh: 监听输入框 focus 事件

events.name: blur
events.description: Listen for the input box blur event
events.description_zh: 监听输入框 blur 事件

events.name: change
events.description: Listen for input field modification events

events.name: clear
events.description: Listen for the input box to clear button event
events.description_zh: 监听输入框清空按钮事件

events.name: linechange
events.description: Listen for changes in the number of rows in the input box

events.name: confirm
events.description: When you click Complete, the confirm event is triggered
events.description_zh: 点击完成时， 触发 confirm 事件

events.name: keyboardheightchange
events.description: This event is triggered when the keyboard height changes
events.description_zh: 键盘高度发生变化的时候触发此事件

events.name: clickprefixicon
events.description: Triggered when the front icon is clicked

events.name: clicksuffixicon
events.description: Triggered when the rear icon is clicked
